series.title: The Mandalorian
series.synopsis: Bounty hunter Din Djarin protects Grogu while navigating the politics of the Outer Rim.
series.notes: Created by Jon Favreau.

series.title: The Book of Boba Fett
series.synopsis: Boba Fett and Fennec Shand claim Jabba the Hutt's former territory on Tatooine.
series.notes: Spin off of The Mandalorian.

series.title: Obi-Wan Kenobi
series.synopsis: Obi-Wan watches over young Luke Skywalker and confronts Darth Vader ten years after Order 66.
series.notes: Limited series starring Ewan McGregor.

series.title: Andor
series.synopsis: Cassian Andor becomes a spy for the Rebel Alliance during the rise of the Empire.
series.notes: Created by Tony Gilroy with a planned two season arc.

series.title: Ahsoka
series.synopsis: Ahsoka Tano searches for Ezra Bridger and the returning threat of Grand Admiral Thrawn.
series.notes: Continuation of Star Wars Rebels story threads.

series.title: Skeleton Crew
series.synopsis: A group of lost youths try to find their way home in the aftermath of the Galactic Civil War.
series.notes: Upcoming coming of age adventure created by Jon Watts and Christopher Ford.

series.title: The Acolyte
series.synopsis: A former Padawan reunites with her Jedi Master to investigate dark side crimes at the end of the High Republic.
series.notes: Live action mystery thriller created by Leslye Headland.

series.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
series.synopsis: Anakin Skywalker, Obi-Wan Kenobi, and Ahsoka Tano lead clone troopers across a galaxy spanning conflict.
series.notes: Seven season animated epic from Lucasfilm Animation.

series.title: Star Wars Rebels
series.synopsis: The crew of the Ghost sparks rebellion on Lothal and beyond.
series.notes: Created by Dave Filoni, Simon Kinberg, and Carrie Beck.

series.title: Star Wars Resistance
series.synopsis: Pilot Kazuda Xiono spies on the First Order in the days leading into The Force Awakens.
series.notes: Animated series from Lucasfilm Animation.

series.title: Star Wars: The Bad Batch
series.synopsis: Clone Force 99 searches for their purpose after the fall of the Republic.
series.notes: Spin off of The Clone Wars.

series.title: Young Jedi Adventures
series.synopsis: Younglings train with Master Yoda and learn the ways of the Force.
series.notes: Animated series aimed at younger viewers.

series.title: Star Wars Forces of Destiny
series.synopsis: Short adventures celebrate the heroines and heroes of every era.
series.notes: Animated micro shorts from Lucasfilm Animation.

series.title: Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures
series.synopsis: Stylized animated shorts reinterpret iconic scenes from the saga.
series.notes: Targets younger fans with fast paced retellings.

series.title: Star Wars: Droids
series.synopsis: C-3PO and R2-D2 embark on episodic adventures with new masters.
series.notes: Animated series from Nelvana.

series.title: Star Wars: Ewoks
series.synopsis: Wicket and his Ewok friends defend Bright Tree Village from threats on Endor.
series.notes: Animated companion to the Ewok films.

series.title: Star Wars: Clone Wars
series.synopsis: Genndy Tartakovsky's serialized shorts bridge Episodes II and III.
series.notes: Hand drawn micro series originally on Cartoon Network.

series.title: LEGO Star Wars: The Freemaker Adventures
series.synopsis: The Freemaker siblings scavenge the galaxy and cross paths with classic heroes and villains.
series.notes: LEGO animated series produced by Wil Film and Lucasfilm Animation.

series.title: LEGO Star Wars: Droid Tales
series.synopsis: C-3PO recounts the entire saga with trademark LEGO humor.
series.notes: Five episode limited series.

series.title: LEGO Star Wars: The Resistance Rises
series.synopsis: Shorts highlight the heroes and villains around The Force Awakens.
series.notes: Collection of animated LEGO shorts.

series.title: LEGO Star Wars: All-Stars
series.synopsis: Anthology of shorts and episodes featuring characters from across the timeline.
series.notes: Mix of regular episodes and micro shorts.

series.title: Star Wars: Visions
series.synopsis: Animation studios from around the world deliver original Star Wars stories.
series.notes: Each volume features standalone shorts.

series.title: Tales of the Jedi
series.synopsis: Animated shorts explore formative moments for Jedi like Ahsoka Tano and Count Dooku.
series.notes: Anthology from Lucasfilm Animation.

series.title: Tales of the Empire
series.synopsis: Anthology companion focusing on characters tied to the dark side and the Empire.
series.notes: Spiritual follow up to Tales of the Jedi.

series.title: Disney Gallery: The Mandalorian
series.synopsis: Documentary series exploring the making of The Mandalorian and other live action projects.
series.notes: Docuseries hosted by Jon Favreau featuring round table discussions.

series.title: Light & Magic
series.synopsis: Documentary chronicles the history of Industrial Light & Magic and groundbreaking visual effects.
series.notes: Directed by Lawrence Kasdan.
